oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NON-RESONANT WAVE AGITATION IN SMALL CRAFT HARBOURS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kamphuis, J.W.
Smith, D.A.Y.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: small craft harbor
harbor
nonresonant wave
wave agitation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A model study of wave agitation in small craft harbours was performed using a square and a rectangular marina basin subjected to monochromatic waves. Wave agitation was measured in up to 273 points within the marina basin and overall wave energy levels were calculated from these measurements for 4 different wave periods, 6 different entrances and 5 different lengths of energy absorbing sections along the perimeter walls. These values were compared and found to correspond well with a rather simple theoretical expression.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 17 (1980): Proceedings of 17th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Sydney, Australia, 1980.; 13
